title: Best Sushi Description
description: Test the model's ability to handle subjective questions and provide nuanced responses.
prompt: Please describe what is the best sushi.
description_zh: 测试模型处理主观问题并提供细致回答的能力。
prompt_zh: 请描述什么是最好的寿司。

title: Basic Python Function
description: Evaluate the model's code generation capabilities for a simple mathematical operation.
prompt: Create a detailed Python function that multiplies two numbers and then subtracts 10 from it.
description_zh: 评估模型对简单数学运算的代码生成能力。
prompt_zh: 创建一个详细的Python函数，该函数将两个数相乘，然后从结果中减去10。

title: Prime Number Sum
description: Test the model's mathematical reasoning and logical skills in tasks involving prime numbers.
prompt: What are the last 4 digits of the sum of the first 70 prime numbers?
description_zh: 测试模型在涉及数学推理和逻辑的任务上的表现。
prompt_zh: 前70个质数的总和的最后四位数字是多少？

title: Family Relationship Logic
description: Test the model's ability to reason about family relationships based on given information.
prompt: Kaye has two brothers. Each of her brothers has two sisters. How many sisters does Kaye have?
description_zh: 测试模型根据给定信息推理家庭关系的能力。
prompt_zh: 凯伊有两个兄弟。她的每个兄弟都有两个姐妹。凯伊有几个姐妹？

title: Strawberry Letter Count
description: Check if the model can accurately count the number of specific letters in a word.
prompt: How many rs are in the word strawberry?
description_zh: 检查模型是否能准确计算单词中特定字母的出现次数。
prompt_zh: 在strawberry这个单词中有多少个r？

title: LLM Concept Game
description: Test the model's creative coding skills by asking it to design a game that teaches LLM concepts.(The game should be educational and interactive.)
prompt: Generate a creative Python game that helps me with learning about LLMs. I need to improve my technical expertise and memorize the key concepts.
description_zh: 通过要求模型设计一个教授LLM概念的游戏来测试其创意编程技能。(游戏应该具有教育性和互动性)
prompt_zh: 生成一个创意Python游戏，帮助我学习LLM。我需要提高我的技术能力和记忆关键概念。

title: Candle Riddle
description: Assess the model's logical reasoning abilities with a tricky riddle.
prompt:
Peter has 5 candles that are all the same length. He lights them all at the same time. After a while, he blows out the candles one after the other. Which of the five candles was the first one he has blown out? Here is a figure of the five candles after they have been blown out. The number of = represents the length of the candle. Respond with the label of the candle that ha.t een blown out first by Peter.
1)=====
2)=========
3)==========
4)=
5)==
description_zh: 通过一个棘手的谜题评估模型的逻辑推理能力。
prompt_zh:
彼得有5支长度相同的蜡烛。他同时点燃了所有的蜡烛。过了一会儿，他依次吹灭了蜡烛。哪支蜡烛是彼得最先吹灭的？这里有5支蜡烛被吹灭后的图示。=的数量代表蜡烛的长度。请用彼得最先吹灭的蜡烛的标签来回答。
1)=====
2)=========
3)==========
4)=
5)==

title: Decimal Comparison
description: Test the model's ability to compare decimal numbers accurately.
description_zh: 测试模型准确比较小数的能力。

title: Math Word Problem
description: Evaluate the model's approach to solving mathematical word problems, whether it can reason step by step.
prompt: I went to the market and bought 10 apples. I gave 2 apples to the neighbor and 2 to the repairman. I then went and bought 5 more apples and ate 1. How many apples did I remain with?
description_zh: 评估模型解决数学应用题的方法, 是否能一步步进行推理。
prompt_zh: 我去市场买了10个苹果。我给了邻居2个，给了修理工人2个。然后我又买了5个苹果，吃了1个。我还剩多少个苹果？

title: Long-form Poetry Generation
description: Test the model's capability to generate extensive creative content.
description_zh: 测试模型生成大量创意内容的能力。

title: RAG Paper Summary
description: Test the model's ability to summarize recent academic papers on a specific topic.
prompt: Please summarize the latest RAG papers for this week?
description_zh: 测试模型总结特定主题最新学术论文的能力。
prompt_zh: 请总结本周最新的RAG（检索增强生成）论文？

title: Travel Recommendations
description: Evaluate the model's knowledge of specific locations and ability to provide travel recommendations.
description_zh: 评估模型对特定地点的了解和提供旅行建议的能力。
prompt_zh: 伯利兹有哪些值得一吃的地方？

title: Current Events Awareness
description: Test the model's awareness of current events and ability to interpret vague requests.
description_zh: 测试模型对当前事件的认知和解释模糊请求的能力。
prompt_zh: 查看新帖子：人工智能末日

title: Creative Sentence Generation
description: Evaluate the model's creativity and ability to generate diverse sentences with a specific constraint.
prompt: Write ten different sentences that end with word "apple"
description_zh: 评估模型的创造力和在特定约束下生成多样化句子的能力。
prompt_zh: 写出十个不同的句子，每个句子都以
